message.content:
cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.CC, cs.GT, cs.CG

Reasoning: 
1. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The paper presents an approximation algorithm for solving linear programs, which involves designing and analyzing algorithms. 
2. cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics) - The paper deals with packing and covering problems, which are classic topics in discrete mathematics. 
3. cs.CC (Computational Complexity) - The paper discusses the time complexity of the algorithm and its approximation factor, which are important aspects of computational complexity. 
4. cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory) - The paper's focus on approximation algorithms for linear programs is relevant to game theory, where such algorithms are used to compute equilibria in games. 
5. cs.CG (Computational Geometry) - The paper's use of geometric arguments and techniques in the analysis of the algorithm may make it relevant to computational geometry.
